featured.text: all the doubts about his ability to play on our school basketball team.
Lisa _____ onto the ground and injured her ankle while she was playing basketball yesterday.
She knew that she couldn’t be a basketball player when she was a child.
Finally, after years of training and intensive workouts, Deborah Duffey was going to compete in her first high school basketball game.
“Adam Joshua!” yelled Nelson, pushing away a basketball and shaking a toy frog off his foot.

definition.zh_def: 一種團隊運動，兩隊在一個矩形場地上用手將球投進對方的籃框中得分。
definition.en_def: A team sport in which two teams try to score points by throwing a ball through the opponent's hoop.
definition.example: She practices basketball every weekend to improve her skills.
